replies.msg:
各大傳媒機構、採訪主任、編輯及記者：

緊急採訪通知

就周梓樂逝世事件及昨晚各區警暴情況，民間記者會將作出有關回應。現誠邀 貴機構派員出席採訪，詳情如下：

日期：2019年11月9日（星期六)
時間：下午3：30

記者會後將設有問答環節，如有查詢可向金先生查詢。

此致
採訪主任、編輯及記者

金先生 謹啟
2019 年 11月 9日

Dear members of the press,

Re: Invitation to an Emergency Press Conference

The Citizens’ Press Conference will be holding an emergency press conference to respond to Alex CHOW Tsz-Lok’s passing and the police’s apparently falsified narratives of the incident. We will also draw attention to any upcoming citizen-led public mourning events and follow-up actions in response to Alex’s tragedy.

We hereby cordially invite your organisation to attend our press conference. The details of the event are as follows:


Date: 9 Nov 2019
Time: 3:30PM

Telephone:
Email: kim@citizenspc.org

Should you have any further questions, please do not hesitate to contact our representative with the information as stated above. Thank you for your kind attention.

Yours faithfully,
Citizens’ Press Conference
推
